name: ウルフファング 空牙2001
summary: Rohga: Armor Force, released in Japan as Wolf Fang: Kuuga 2001 (ウルフファング 空牙2001), is a 1991 run and gun/platform hybrid arcade game developed and published by Data East. It is related to Vapor Trail and was itself followed by Skull Fang.
